About Me

Few things about me.

BIO

I am specialised in Project Management & software testing (Android, web and hybrid), developing product user-stories, product planning, and wireframe designing. I have graduated in Bachelor of Information and Communication from Turku University of Applied Sciences, Turku, Finland. I have good work experience with software testing. Besides computer and technology, I love blogging and travelling.
